summary: The 1982 Formula One season was the 33rd championship.
full_text: Didier Joseph Louis Pironi  was a racing driver from France. During his career he competed in 72 Formula One World Championship Grands Prix, driving for Tyrrell , Ligier  and Ferrari . He won the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1978 driving a Renault Alpine A442B.
title: Didier Pironi
